messages.title: WHICH DO YOU WANT?
messages.content: It's your choice. Vote Labour, Conservative or Lib-Dem to remain in an EU which will soon become the United States of Europe OR Believe in Britain and on May 7th 2015 Vote Robert Izzard of UKIP for your next Tonbridge & Malling MP

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for Britain to leave the EU, opposing the idea of remaining in the European Union which is suggested to soon become the United States of Europe.

issues.brexitEurope: Advocates for Britain to leave the EU, opposing the idea of remaining in the European Union which is suggested to soon become the United States of Europe.

contactInformation.address: 33 Charles Meadow, East Peckham, Kent TN12 5HD

images.caption: Campaign leaflet showing Robert Izzard of UKIP posing next to a map highlighting the UK's membership to EU.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet shows a contrast, suggesting a choice between staying in the EU and voting for the three major parties or voting UKIP to leave the EU.
